privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Mobile For You, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
privacy.section1Content:
We collect minimal personal information necessary to provide our services:
• Your name
• Phone number
• City
• Store name

We do not collect or process credit card or payment information through our platform.
privacy.section2Content:
We use the collected information for:
• Account identification and management
• Communication regarding orders and services
• Service improvement and customer support
• Compliance with legal obligations
privacy.section3Content:
Your data is stored securely in our database with:
• Restricted access limited to authorized administrators
• Industry-standard encryption
• Regular security audits
• Secure backup systems
privacy.section4Content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Update or correct your information
• Request deletion of your data
• Object to data processing
• File a complaint with relevant authorities
privacy.section5Content:
We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. Data may only be shared:
• With your explicit consent
• When required by law
• To protect our rights and safety
privacy.section6Content:
For any privacy-related questions or data requests, please contact us at:

Phone: +972 52-727-5393
Email: support@mobileforyou.co.il

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Mobile For You. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to these terms of service. Please read them carefully.

• Product browsing and ordering
• Inventory management tools
• Client relationship management
• Order tracking and delivery coordination
terms.section2Content:
To use our services, you must:

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

However, we operate on a best-effort basis and cannot guarantee uninterrupted service.

Our liability is limited to the amount you paid for the service.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Declaration
accessibility.intro: Mobile For You is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying relevant accessibility standards.
accessibility.section1Content: We aim to conform to the Israeli Accessibility Standard IS 5568 and WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards. Our website includes the following accessibility features:
accessibility.section2Content:
• Adjustable text size and browser zoom compatibility
• High color contrast for improved readability
• Keyboard navigation support with visible focus indicators
• Alternative text for images
• Clear and simple language in Hebrew and English
• Consistent navigation structure
• Form labels and error messages
• Skip navigation links
accessibility.section3Content:
Our website is designed to be compatible with:
• Modern web browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
• Screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
• Keyboard-only navigation
• Mobile devices and tablets
accessibility.section4Content:
We are continuously working to improve accessibility through:
• Regular accessibility audits
• User testing with assistive technologies
• Staff training on accessibility best practices
• Incorporating user feedback
• Updating content and features with accessibility in mind
accessibility.section5Content:
While we strive for full accessibility, some limitations may exist:
• Third-party content may not meet all accessibility standards
• Legacy features are being progressively enhanced
• Some dynamic content may require additional navigation
accessibility.section6Content:
We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Mobile For You. If you encounter accessibility barriers, please contact us:

Accessibility Coordinator
Phone: +972 52-727-5393
Email: accessibility@mobileforyou.co.il

We will respond to feedback within 5 business days and work to address any issues.

delivery.title: Delivery & Returns Policy
delivery.section1Content:
• Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days
• Delivery times vary by location (same day to 3 business days)
• Free delivery for orders above minimum threshold
• Delivery costs are calculated based on location and order size
• You will receive notification when your order is ready for delivery
delivery.section2Content:
• Track your order status in real-time through your dashboard
• Receive updates via WhatsApp and email
• Contact us for any delivery inquiries
delivery.section3Content:
• Orders can be cancelled before processing begins
• Returns accepted within 14 days for unopened, defective items
• Original packaging and accessories must be included
• Proof of purchase required
• Contact us to initiate a return
delivery.section4Content:
• All products come with manufacturer warranty
• Warranty terms vary by product and importer
• Warranty information is provided with each order
• We assist with warranty claims and service
delivery.section5Content:
• Inspect items upon delivery
• Report damage or defects within 24 hours
• We will arrange replacement or refund
• Photos of damage may be requested
delivery.section6Content:
